title: P22 Announces A New Collection: TypeSETit
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204121532/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 2.Feb.2009 2.59pm 

For Immediate Release  
Buffalo, NY- February 2nd, 2009

P22 is proud to announce that it is now offering the TypeSETit collection  
of fonts by Rob Leuschke

TypeSETit is a type foundry featuring the collected designs of calligrapher  
Rob Leuschke. Rob got his start in the 1980s working as a lettering artist  
at Hallmark Cards. Eventually Rob decided to pursue a freelance career and  
posted samples of his work online, which led to many requests to purchase  
his lettering designs. In 2000, Rob and P22's International House of Fonts  
came to an agreement giving IHOF the right to distribute five of his  
designs, Corinthia, Imperial Script, Ohley, Petemoss and Ruthie. Now P22 is  
very pleased to announce that it is distributing all 75 Rob Leuschke  
designs. You'll find a script font for every occasion in the TypeSETit  
Collection, whether you need an expressive brush script or elegant formal  
calligraphy.

[http://p22.com/typesetit](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204121532/http:/p22.com/typesetit "http://p22.com/typesetit")
author: Miss Tiffany
